intro: TypeScript? React? Of course I know them - I use them daily. Backend too, as long as we're talking about Node or Django. When it comes to version control I'd say GitHub. Visit this page on mobile device or use dev tools to experience my way of Responsive Web Design

intro.head: This is me.
intro.desc: A young web developer from Poland, looking for an opportunity.

main.title: I have loved computers since I was a child - so I learned how they work and how to build them. When I became a teenager I decided to learn how to create software - so I learned HTML, CSS & JS
main.body: Because that's what most of the web boils down to - HTML Document, Styling and Scripting. But it's not that simple, is it? Let's quickly break it down:
main.html: We are at version 5 of HTML,
